sentence.Network_en: Inconsiderate neighbours can be more than an annoyance.
sentence.Network_cn: 不为他人着想的邻居会非常惹人厌。

sentence.Network_en: Motorists were criticised for being inconsiderate to pedestrians.
sentence.Network_cn: 开车的人因不考虑行人而受到指责。

sentence.Network_en: It was inconsiderate of you not to call.
sentence.Network_cn: 你连个电话也不打，不够体谅人。

inconsiderable 不足取的inconsiderate 不顾及别人的-

list.abs: a : of course I am talking about you . I've been waiting here an hour , you inconsiderate jerk !我当然是说你！我在这儿等了一个小时了，你这个不顾别人的傻瓜！
passed his life in an inconsiderable village ; their duties were inconsiderable ; had no inconsiderable influence ., 在一个小山村里度过了他的一生 ; 他们的职务是微不足道的 ; 没有任何的影响.
He passed his life in an inconsiderable village ., 他在一个小小村落中度过他的一生.
She ' s very inconsiderate and only cares about herself ., 她非常不体贴而且只关心她自己.
he passed his life in an inconsiderable village ., 他在一个小小村落中度过他的一生.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (originally in the sense 'not properly considered'): from Latin inconsideratus, from in- 'not' + consideratus 'examined, considered' (see considerate)

entry.tran: 不体谅别人的;不替别人着想的
entry.def: If you accuse someone of being inconsiderate, you mean that they do not take enough care over how their words or actions will affect other people.

example.ex: Motorists were criticised for being inconsiderate to pedestrians.
example.tran: 开车的人因不考虑行人而受到指责。
他不替别人着想的行为

means.word_mean: 1. lacking regard for the rights or feelings of others;

sentences.sentence: "prejudice is the holding of unconsidered opinions"

auth_sentence.content: An inconsiderate application of genuine principles to particular instances.
auth_sentence.res_content: An inconsiderate application of genuine principles to particular instances.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An inconsiderate application of genuine principles to particular instances.

auth_sentence.content: Inconsiderate authors wou'd rather be admir'd than understood.
auth_sentence.res_content: Inconsiderate authors wou'd rather be admir'd than understood.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Inconsiderate authors wou'd rather be admir'd than understood.

auth_sentence.content: This is how short-term, profit-driven, and inconsiderate these people are.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is how short-term, profit-driven, and inconsiderate these people are.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is how short-term, profit-driven, and inconsiderate these people are.

means.word_mean: 不替别人着想的,不体谅别人的

sentences.en: Being inconsiderate to the doctor will get you off on the wrong footing.
sentences.cn: 不替医生着想一点的话，你一开头就讨不了好。
